description:
What is LIGHTNING LEARN?
=========================

It's a great way to share what you know and learn something new.
The talks are rapid-fire, short presentations, with a strict format that keeps things fun and fast.

You get a bit over 5 mins per presentation, a very fast intro, a little about the presenter then 30 seconds a slide, with automatic side progression. 10 slides, then a few minutes of Q&A after.

Come join us for a few beers, share what you've learned and learn something new. Its going to be awesome.

Whats the theme?
=================

This first session's theme is around Code / JavaScript as we have a few talks ready for this topic, expect talks on React.JS, HapiJS, Redux, NodeJS and alike.
But talks on other related topics are VERY welcome too.

===================

Talks should be made using slides.com (keeps things easy, no messing about with thumb drives or powerpoint - yuk). Its free to sign up and very easy to use.

We have a template/example here https://slides.com/a_c_m/lightning-learn-template which can be forked.

Rules for the Deck
* Deck must be public
* Must be 13 slides long: Cover, About You, 1-10 content, END slide
* Must be configured to auto-slide every 30 seconds, with slide numbers, no loop (all in settings)
* You won't be controlling the deck, an organizer will load it up and start the auto progression.

If you want to present (please do!) please submit your title + description (and ideally link to draft/completed slides.com deck) to us through a message in the Meetup group at least 24 hours before the session.
Slots are first come, first serve but at the organizer's discretion.

Schedule
==========

10 mins setup: Introduction, final running order etc.
50 mins: 5 presentations
30 mins: break, chat, beer etc
50 mins: 5 presentations
Fin + socializing

ITS GOING TO BE AWESOME
name: Lightning Learn Code / Javascript
